name: Don't Drop The Drop
description:
This game created in a week by one game design student, invite you to play the role of a raindrop whose purpose is to dangerously jump from falling leaves to falling leaves in order to find a safe place to rest.

Credits

Mylene Ben Osman

Facebook

Twitter

Itch.io

Tsun Dv (music and sounds)

Facebook

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
